externalDocs.description: Attributes in DICOM JSON Model Format

dicomDeviceName.title: Device Name
dicomDeviceName.description: A unique name for the device which provides this AE

dicomAETitle.title: AE Title
dicomAETitle.description: Unique AE title for this Network AE

dcmOtherAETitle.title: Other AE Title
dcmOtherAETitle.description: Additional AE Title of Network AE - will also accept Association RQs with such Called AE Title

hl7ApplicationName.title: HL7 Application name
hl7ApplicationName.description: HL7 Application and Facility name (Application|Facility) associated with this AE

dicomDescription.title: AE Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the AE

dicomAssociationInitiator.title: Association Initiator
dicomAssociationInitiator.description: True if the Network AE can initiate associations, false otherwise

dicomAssociationAcceptor.title: Association Acceptor
dicomAssociationAcceptor.description: True if the Network AE can accept associations, false otherwise

dicomApplicationCluster.title: Application Cluster
dicomApplicationCluster.description: Locally defined names for a subset of related applications

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the AE is installed on network. If not present, information about the installed status of the AE is inherited from the device

dicomHostname.title: Hostname
dicomHostname.description: DNS name for this particular connection

dicomPort.title: Port
dicomPort.description: TCP/UDP port that a service is listening on. May be missing if this network connection is only used for outbound connections

dicomTLSCipherSuite.title: TLS CipherSuites
dicomTLSCipherSuite.description: The TLS CipherSuites that are supported on this particular connection. If not present TLS is disabled

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the Network Connection is installed on the network. If not present, information about the installed status of the Network Connection is inherited from the device

dicomAETitle.title: AE Title
dicomAETitle.description: Unique AE title for this Network AE

dcmOtherAETitle.title: Other AE Title
dcmOtherAETitle.description: Additional AE Title of Network AE - will also accept Association RQs with such Called AE Title

dicomDescription.title: AE Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the application entity

dcmHideNotRejectedInstances.title: Hide Not Rejected Instances
dcmHideNotRejectedInstances.description: Indicates that the Q/R Services of the AE hides instances not rejected by any reason; false if absent

dcmAllowDeletePatient.title: Allow Delete Patient
dcmAllowDeletePatient.description: Indicates policy for Allow Permanent Deletion of Patients; WITHOUT_STUDIES by default

dcmAllowDeleteStudyPermanently.title: Allow Delete Patient
dcmAllowDeleteStudyPermanently.description: Indicates policy for Allow Permanent Deletion of Patients; WITHOUT_STUDIES by default

connectTime.title: Connect Time
connectTime.description: Time when this Association was established

initiated.title: Initiated
initiated.description: Indicates if this Association was initiated or accepted by the Archive

localAETitle.title: Local AE Title
localAETitle.description: AE Title of the Archive used as Calling AE Title of requested or as Called AE Title in accepted Associations

remoteAETitle.title: Remote AE Title
remoteAETitle.description: AE Title of remote AE used as Called AE Title of requested or as Calling AE Title in accepted Associations

<other-property>.title: Other property
<other-property>.description: Other property associated with this Associations

dcmEntity.title: Attribute Entity
dcmEntity.description: Entity of the Attribute Filter or Export Rule ('Patient', 'Study', 'Series', 'Instance', 'MPPS', 'MWL').

dcmCustomAttribute1.title: Custom Attribute 1
dcmCustomAttribute1.description: Configure any attribute from the DICOM object which shall be inserted in database as Custom Attribute 1. Eg. DicomAttribute[@tag="00200070"]/Value[@number="1"] or for a Private attribute DicomAttribute[@tag="00E10024" and @privateCreator="ELSCINT1"]/Value[@number="1"]

dcmCustomAttribute2.title: Custom Attribute 2
dcmCustomAttribute2.description: Configure any attribute from the DICOM object which shall be inserted in database as Custom Attribute 2. Eg. DicomAttribute[@tag="00200070"]/Value[@number="1"] or for a Private attribute DicomAttribute[@tag="00E10024" and @privateCreator="ELSCINT1"]/Value[@number="1"]

dcmCustomAttribute3.title: Custom Attribute 3
dcmCustomAttribute3.description: Configure any attribute from the DICOM object which shall be inserted in database as Custom Attribute 3. Eg. DicomAttribute[@tag="00200070"]/Value[@number="1"] or for a Private attribute DicomAttribute[@tag="00E10024" and @privateCreator="ELSCINT1"]/Value[@number="1"]

dcmAttributeUpdatePolicy.title: Attribute Update Policy
dcmAttributeUpdatePolicy.description: Specifies update policy for extracted attributes into the DB on Series, Study & Patient level on receive of further instance of the entity. PRESERVE (= nullify attributes in the new dataset which are not present in the original dataset), SUPPLEMENT (= attributes not present in original dataset will be supplemented), REPLACE (= original dataset is completely replaced), MERGE (= attribute values will be written from new dataset), OVERWRITE (= attribute values if null in new dataset, will be nullified in original dataset). If absent, PRESERVE will be applied

type.title: Attribute Set Type
type.description: Specifies if this Attribute Set is used by Query Parameter 'comparefield' of DIFF-RS or by Query Parameter 'includefields' of WADO-RS requests.

id.title: Attribute Set ID
id.description: ID used by Query Parameter 'comparefield' of DIFF-RS requests and by Query Parameter 'includefields' of WADO-RS Metadata requests to refer this Attribute Set.

description.title: Attribute Set Description
description.description: Unconstrained text description of this Attribute Set

dicomDeviceName.title: Device Name
dicomDeviceName.description: A unique name for this device

dicomDescription.title: Device Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the device

dicomManufacturer.title: Manufacturer
dicomManufacturer.description: Should be the same as the value of Manufacturer (0008,0070) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomManufacturerModelName.title: Manufacturer Model Name
dicomManufacturerModelName.description: Should be the same as the value of Manufacturer Model Name (0008,1090) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomSoftwareVersion.title: Software Version
dicomSoftwareVersion.description: Should be the same as the values of Software Versions (0018,1020) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomStationName.title: Station Name
dicomStationName.description: Should be the same as the value of Station Name (0008,1010) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomPrimaryDeviceType.title: Primary Device Type
dicomPrimaryDeviceType.description: Represents the kind of device and is most applicable for acquisition modalities

dicomInstitutionName.title: Institution Name
dicomInstitutionName.description: Should be the same as the value of Institution Name (0008,0080) in SOP Instances created by this device

dicomInstitutionDepartmentName.title: Institution Department Name
dicomInstitutionDepartmentName.description: Should be the same as the value of Institutional Department Name (0008,1040) in SOP Instances created by this device

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: Boolean to indicate whether this device is presently installed on the network

hasArcDevExt.title: Has Archive Device Extension
hasArcDevExt.description: Boolean to indicate whether this device has an archive device extension or not

scheduled.title: Scheduled Tasks
scheduled.description: Number of scheduled tasks in the batch

in-process.title: In process Tasks
in-process.description: Number of in process tasks in the batch

warning.title: Warning Tasks
warning.description: Number of completed tasks in the batch

failed.title: Failed Tasks
failed.description: Number of failed tasks in the batch

canceled.title: Canceled Tasks
canceled.description: Number of canceled tasks in the batch

completed.title: Completed Tasks
completed.description: Number of completed tasks in the batch

dicomDeviceName.title: Device Name
dicomDeviceName.description: Name of Devices performing tasks in the batch

LocalAET.title: Local AET
LocalAET.description: Archive AE Title which was used as Calling AET

PrimaryAET.title: Primary AET
PrimaryAET.description: AE Title of the primary C-FIND SCP

SecondaryAET.title: Secondary AET
SecondaryAET.description: AE Title of the secondary C-FIND SCP

checkMissing.title: Check Missing
checkMissing.description: Indicates if the task checks for studies only available at the primary C-FIND SCP

checkDifferent.title: Check Different
checkDifferent.description: Indicates if the task checks for different attributes of studies available at the primary and the secondary C-FIND SCP

comparefield.title: Compare Field
comparefield.description: Refers set of attributes which are compared by tasks of this batch

matches.title: matches
matches.description: number of studies compared by tasks of this batch

missing.title: missing
missing.description: number of studies only available at the primary C-FIND SCP

different.title: different
different.description: number of studies which differs in the compared attributes between the primary and the secondary C-FIND SCP

createdTimeRange.title: Created Time Range
createdTimeRange.description: time range when tasks of the batch were created

updatedTimeRange.title: Updated Time Range
updatedTimeRange.description: time range when tasks of the batch were last updated

scheduledTimeRange.title: Scheduled Time Range
scheduledTimeRange.description: time range when next attempt to process tasks of the batch are scheduled

processingStartTimeRange.title: Processing Start Time Range
processingStartTimeRange.description: time range when last attempt to process tasks of the batch started

processingEndTimeRange.title: Processing End Time Range
processingEndTimeRange.description: time range when last attempt to process tasks of the batch finished

dicomDeviceName.title: Archive Device by which the Task is processed

failures.title: Failures
failures.description: number of failed attempts to process this task

createdTime.title: Created Time
createdTime.description: time when this task was created

updatedTime.title: Updated Time
updatedTime.description: time when this task was last updated

scheduledTime.title: Scheduled Time
scheduledTime.description: time when next attempt to process this task is scheduled

processingStartTime.title: Processing Start Time
processingStartTime.description: time when last attempt to process this task started

processingEndTime.title: Processing End Time
processingEndTime.description: time when last attempt to process this task finished

errorMessage.title: Error Message
errorMessage.description: error message of last failed attempt to process this task

outcomeMessage.title: Outcome Message
outcomeMessage.description: outcome message of process this task

RequesterURI.title: Request URI
RequesterURI.description: Endpoint URI of RESTful Service by which this task was scheduled

RequesterUserID.title: Requester User ID
RequesterUserID.description: ID of user who invoked the RESTful Service, if the user has been authenticated, or the IP of the HTTP client if the user has not been authenticated.

RequesterHostName.title: Requester Hostname
RequesterHostName.description: Hostname of HTTP client which invoked the RESTful Service

ExporterID.title: Exporter ID
ExporterID.description: ID of exporter performing the Task

LocalAET.title: Local AET
LocalAET.description: Archive AE Title which was used as Calling AET

RemoteAET.title: Remote AET
RemoteAET.description: AE Title of the C-MOVE SCP

FindSCP.title: Find SCP
FindSCP.description: AE Title of C-FIND SCP to verify, if a Study is already available at the Destination

StudyInstanceUID.title: Study Instance UID
StudyInstanceUID.description: Unique Identifier of the Study to be retrieved

SeriesInstanceUID.title: Series Instance UID
SeriesInstanceUID.description: Unique Identifier of the Series to be retrieved

SOPInstanceUID.title: SOP Instance UID
SOPInstanceUID.description: Unique Identifier of the Object to be retrieved

UpdateLocationStatus.title: Update Location Status
UpdateLocationStatus.description: Indicates if the Status of the Location DB record shall be updated on Storage Verification accordingly.

StorageID.title: Storage IDs
StorageID.description: Indicates that for successful Storage Verification the object must be stored on (one of) the specified Storage System

completed.title: Number of Instances for which Storage Verification succeeded

failed.title: Number of Instances for which Storage Verification failed

LocalAET.title: Local AET
LocalAET.description: Archive AE Title which was used as Calling AET

PrimaryAET.title: Primary AET
PrimaryAET.description: AE Title of the primary C-FIND SCP

SecondaryAET.title: Secondary AET
SecondaryAET.description: AE Title of the secondary C-FIND SCP

checkMissing.title: Check Missing
checkMissing.description: Indicates if the task checks for studies only available at the primary C-FIND SCP

checkDifferent.title: Check Different
checkDifferent.description: Indicates if the task checks for different attributes of studies available at the primary and the secondary C-FIND SCP

comparefield.title: Compare Field
comparefield.description: Refers set of attributes which are compared by this task

matches.title: matches
matches.description: number of studies compared by this task

missing.title: missing
missing.description: number of studies only available at the primary C-FIND SCP

different.title: different
different.description: number of studies which differs in the compared attributes between the primary and the secondary C-FIND SCP

LocalAET.title: Local AET
LocalAET.description: Archive AE acting as Storage Commitment SCP

RemoteAET.title: Remote AET
RemoteAET.description: Remote AE acting as Storage Commitment SCU

LocalAET.title: Local AET
LocalAET.description: Archive AE acting as Storage Commitment SCU

RemoteAET.title: Remote AET
RemoteAET.description: Remote AE acting as Storage Commitment SCP

StudyInstanceUID.title: Study Instance UID
StudyInstanceUID.description: Unique Identifier of the Study which Storage Commitment is requested

SeriesInstanceUID.title: Series Instance UID
SeriesInstanceUID.description: Unique Identifier of the Series which Storage Commitment is requested

SOPInstanceUID.title: SOP Instance UID
SOPInstanceUID.description: Unique Identifier of the Object which Storage Commitment is requested

ExporterID.title: Exporter ID
ExporterID.description: ID of exporter by which the Storage Commitment Task was scheduled.

LocalAET.title: Local AET
LocalAET.description: Archive AE performing the Rejection by creating and storing a corresponding Rejection Note

StudyInstanceUID.title: Study Instance UID
StudyInstanceUID.description: Unique Identifier of the Study which is rejected

SeriesInstanceUID.title: Series Instance UID
SeriesInstanceUID.description: Unique Identifier of the Series which is rejected

SOPInstanceUID.title: SOP Instance UID
SOPInstanceUID.description: Unique Identifier of the Object which is rejected

PatientID.title: Patient ID
PatientID.description: ID of Patient concerned by the RESTful Operation

TLSAllowAnyHostname.title: TLS Allow Any Hostname
TLSAllowAnyHostname.description: Indicates if the hostname in the HTTPS server’s certificate is not validated

TLSDisableTrustManager.title: TLS Disable Trust Manager
TLSDisableTrustManager.description: Indicates if the HTTPS server’s certificate is not validated at all

LocalAET.title: Local AET
LocalAET.description: Archive AE acting as IAN SCU

RemoteAET.title: Remote AET
RemoteAET.description: Remote AE acting as IAN SCP

LocalAET.title: Local AET
LocalAET.description: Archive AE acting as MPPS SCU

RemoteAET.title: Remote AET
RemoteAET.description: Remote AE acting as MPPS SCP

scheduled.description: Number of scheduled tasks in the batch

dicomDeviceName.description: A unique name for the device which provides this HL7 Application

hl7OtherApplicationName.description: Additional HL7 Application and Facility name (Application|Facility) - will also accept HL7 messages with such Receiving Application and Facility name

dicomApplicationCluster.title: Application Cluster

dicomPort.title: Port

dicomTLSCipherSuite.description: The TLS CipherSuites that are supported on this particular connection. If not present TLS is disabled

dicomDescription.title: Metrics Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the metrics

description.title: PDQ Service Description
description.description: Unconstrained text description of the PDQ Service

failed.title: Number of Instances failed to reject

codingSchemeDesignatorPathParam.title: Coding Scheme Designator
codingSchemeDesignatorPathParam.description: Coding Scheme Designator of Rejection Note

scheduled.description: Number of scheduled tasks in the batch

dicomDeviceName.description: A unique name for this device

requested.title: Requested
requested.description: number of instances requested for Storage Commitment

failures.title: Failures
failures.description: number of instances for which Storage Commitment failed

createdTime.title: Created Time
createdTime.description: time when this Storage Commitment was requested

updatedTime.title: Updated Time
updatedTime.description: time when this Storage Commitment was last updated

supplementIssuerResult.title: Supplement Issuer of Patient ID results

pids.title: Patient IDs
pids.description: Successfully supplemented Patient IDs encoded as HL7 CX

ambiguous.title: Ambiguous Patient IDs
ambiguous.description: Ambiguous Patient IDs which did not got unique by supplementing the Issuer as HL7 CX

pid.title: Ambiguous Patient ID
pid.description: Ambiguous Patient ID as HL7 CX

failures.title: Failures
failures.description: Other failures not caused by ambiguous Patient IDs

pid.title: Failed to supplement Patient ID
pid.description: Failed to supplement Patient ID as HL7 CX

tooManyDuplicates.title: tooManyDuplicates
tooManyDuplicates.description: Patient ID which number of duplicates exceeds configured fetch size

updateCharsetOfPatientResult.title: Update Character Set of Patient result

updated.title: Number of updated Patients
updated.description: Number of Patients which LO, LT, PN, SH, ST, UT attributes were transcoded to the new Character Set

failures.title: Failures
failures.description: Patient IDs encoded as HL7 CX of Patients which LO, LT, PN, SH, ST, UT attributes could not be transcoded to the new Character Set

scheduled.title: Scheduled Tasks
scheduled.description: Number of scheduled tasks in the batch

in-process.title: In process Tasks
in-process.description: Number of in process tasks in the batch

warning.title: Warning Tasks
warning.description: Number of completed tasks in the batch

failed.description: Number of failed tasks in the batch

canceled.title: Canceled Tasks
canceled.description: Number of canceled tasks in the batch

completed.title: Completed Tasks
completed.description: Number of completed tasks in the batch

dicomDeviceName.title: Device Name
dicomDeviceName.description: Name of Devices performing tasks in the batch

LocalAET.title: Local AET
LocalAET.description: Archive AE Titles performing tasks in the batch

createdTimeRange.title: Created Time Range
createdTimeRange.description: time range when tasks of the batch were created

updatedTimeRange.title: Updated Time Range
updatedTimeRange.description: time range when tasks of the batch were last updated

scheduledTimeRange.title: Scheduled Time Range
scheduledTimeRange.description: time range when next attempt to process tasks of the batch are scheduled

processingStartTimeRange.title: Processing Start Time Range
processingStartTimeRange.description: time range when last attempt to process tasks of the batch started

processingEndTimeRange.title: Processing End Time Range
processingEndTimeRange.description: time range when last attempt to process tasks of the batch finished

dcmDigestAlgorithm.title: Digest Algorithm
dcmDigestAlgorithm.description: Algorithm for generation of check sums: 'MD5' or 'SHA-1'

dcmInstanceAvailability.title: Instance Availability
dcmInstanceAvailability.description: Instance Availability: ONLINE, NEARLINE or OFFLINE

dcmStorageDuration.title: Storage Duration
dcmStorageDuration.description: Indicates if the Storage is used as permanent (=PERMANENT), cache (=CACHE) or temporary (=TEMPORARY) storage.

dcmReadOnly.title: Read Only
dcmReadOnly.description: Indicates if a Storage System is read only

storageThreshold.title: Storage Threshold
storageThreshold.description: Minimal Usable Space on Storage System. If the usable space fall below that value the Storage System will be removed from the list of configured Storage Systems of the Network AE requesting that Storage System in bytes

deleterThreshold.title: Deleter Threshold
deleterThreshold.description: Minimal Usable Space on Storage System to trigger deletion. If present, studies are deleted from the Storage System, if the usable space fall below that value

dcmDeleterThreads.title: Deleter Threads
dcmDeleterThreads.description: Number of Threads used for deletion of objects from the Storage System.

dcmExternalRetrieveAET.title: External Retrieve AETs
dcmExternalRetrieveAET.description: Constrain deletion of Studies, additionally to configured deleter thresholds and/or deletion retention period constraints, if usable space falls below the configured threshold, to Studies which objects are retrievable using one of the AEs from an external C-MOVE SCP.

dcmExportStorageID.title: Export Storage ID
dcmExportStorageID.description: Constrain deletion of Studies, additionally to configured deleter thresholds and/or deletion retention period constraints, if usable space falls below the configured threshold, to Studies which objects are also accessible from the specified other storage.

dcmNoDeletionConstraint.title: No Deletion Constraint
dcmNoDeletionConstraint.description: Delete Studies from cache/temporary Storage System, if no Deleter Threshold and no other deletion constraint is configured.

dcmRetrieveCacheStorageID.title: Retrieve Cache Storage ID
dcmRetrieveCacheStorageID.description: Specifies another Storage to which objects are copied in parallel on retrieve to increase the performance on accessing storage systems which provides more bandwidth using multiple connections in parallel.

dcmStorageClusterID.title: Storage Cluster ID
dcmStorageClusterID.description: Specifies storage cluster to which the storage system belongs.

dcmRetrieveCacheMaxParallel.title: Retrieve Cache Max Parallel
dcmRetrieveCacheMaxParallel.description: Maximal number of parallel copies to cache storage on retrieve.

dicomAETitle.title: AE Title
dicomAETitle.description: AE Title associated with the Storage System

dcmDeleteStudiesOlderThan.title: Delete Studies Older Than
dcmDeleteStudiesOlderThan.description: Delete Studies from the Storage System configured for cache (dcmStorageDuration=CACHE) or temporary (dcmStorageDuration=TEMPORARY) storage, if their Study Date is longer ago than the specified value in ISO-8601 period format. Format [nn"["<schedule>"]"](PnYnMnD|PnW).

dcmDeleteStudiesReceivedBefore.title: Delete Studies Received Before
dcmDeleteStudiesReceivedBefore.description: Delete Studies from the Storage System configured for cache (dcmStorageDuration=CACHE) or temporary (dcmStorageDuration=TEMPORARY) storage, if they were received longer ago than the specified value in ISO-8601 period format. Format [nn"["<schedule>"]"](PnYnMnD|PnW).

dcmDeleteStudiesNotUsedSince.title: Delete Studies Not Used Since
dcmDeleteStudiesNotUsedSince.description: Delete Studies from the Storage System configured for cache (dcmStorageDuration=CACHE) or temporary (dcmStorageDuration=TEMPORARY) storage, if they were last accessed longer ago than the specified value in ISO-8601 period format. Format [nn"["<schedule>"]"](PnYnMnD|PnW).

usableSpace.title: Usable Space
usableSpace.description: Usable Space left on Storage System in bytes

totalSpace.title: Total Space
totalSpace.description: Total Space on Storage System in bytes

dicomDeviceName.title: Device Name
dicomDeviceName.description: A unique name for the device which provides this Web Application

dicomAETitle.title: AE Title
dicomAETitle.description: AE title of Network AE associated with this Web Application

dicomDescription.title: Web Application Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the Web Application

dicomApplicationCluster.title: Application Cluster
dicomApplicationCluster.description: Locally defined names for a subset of related applications

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the Web Application is installed on network. If not present, information about the installed status of the Web Application is inherited from the device

dicomHostname.title: Hostname
dicomHostname.description: DNS name for this particular connection

dicomPort.title: Port
dicomPort.description: TCP/UDP port that a service is listening on. May be missing if this network connection is only used for outbound connections

dicomTLSCipherSuite.title: TLS CipherSuites
dicomTLSCipherSuite.description: The TLS CipherSuites that are supported on this particular connection. If not present TLS is disabled

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the Network Connection is installed on the network. If not present, information about the installed status of the Network Connection is inherited from the device

dicomDeviceName.title: Device Name
dicomDeviceName.description: A unique name for this device

dicomDescription.title: Device Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the device

dicomManufacturer.title: Manufacturer
dicomManufacturer.description: Should be the same as the value of Manufacturer (0008,0070) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomManufacturerModelName.title: Manufacturer Model Name
dicomManufacturerModelName.description: Should be the same as the value of Manufacturer Model Name (0008,1090) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomSoftwareVersion.title: Software Version
dicomSoftwareVersion.description: Should be the same as the values of Software Versions (0018,1020) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomStationName.title: Station Name
dicomStationName.description: Should be the same as the value of Station Name (0008,1010) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomDeviceSerialNumber.title: Device Serial Number
dicomDeviceSerialNumber.description: Should be the same as the value of Device Serial Number (0018,1000) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomPrimaryDeviceType.title: Primary Device Type
dicomPrimaryDeviceType.description: Represents the kind of device and is most applicable for acquisition modalities

dicomInstitutionName.title: Institution Name
dicomInstitutionName.description: Should be the same as the value of Institution Name (0008,0080) in SOP Instances created by this device

dicomInstitutionAddress.title: Institution Address
dicomInstitutionAddress.description: Should be the same as the value of Institution Address (0008,0081) attribute in SOP Instances created by this device

dicomInstitutionDepartmentName.title: Institution Department Name
dicomInstitutionDepartmentName.description: Should be the same as the value of Institutional Department Name (0008,1040) in SOP Instances created by this device

dicomIssuerOfPatientID.title: Issuer of Patient ID
dicomIssuerOfPatientID.description: Default value for the Issuer of Patient ID (0010,0021), and optionally also default values for the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Issuer of Patient ID Qualifiers Sequence (0010,0024) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Issuer of Patient ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomIssuerOfAccessionNumber.title: Issuer of Accession Number
dicomIssuerOfAccessionNumber.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Issuer of Accession Number Sequence (0008,0051) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomOrderPlacerIdentifier.title: Order Placer Identifier
dicomOrderPlacerIdentifier.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Order Placer Identifier Sequence (0040,0026) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomOrderFillerIdentifier.title: Order Filler Identifier
dicomOrderFillerIdentifier.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Order Filler Identifier Sequence (0040,0027) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomIssuerOfAdmissionID.title: Issuer of Admission ID
dicomIssuerOfAdmissionID.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Issuer of Admission ID Sequence (0038,0014) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomIssuerOfServiceEpisodeID.title: Issuer of Service Episode ID
dicomIssuerOfServiceEpisodeID.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Issuer of Service Episode ID Sequence (0038,0064) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomIssuerOfContainerIdentifier.title: Issuer of Container Identifier
dicomIssuerOfContainerIdentifier.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Issuer of Container Identifier Sequence (0040,0513) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomIssuerOfSpecimenIdentifier.title: Issuer of Specimen Identifier
dicomIssuerOfSpecimenIdentifier.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Issuer of Specimen Identifier Sequence (0040,0562) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomAuthorizedNodeCertificateReference.title: Authorized Node Certificate Reference
dicomAuthorizedNodeCertificateReference.description: The DNs for the certificates of nodes that are authorized to connect to this device

dicomThisNodeCertificateReference.title: This Node Certificate Reference
dicomThisNodeCertificateReference.description: The DNs of the public certificate(s) for this node

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: Boolean to indicate whether this device is presently installed on the network

dicomNetworkAE.title: Network AEs
dicomNetworkAE.description: Application entity provided by the device

networkConnection.title: Network Connection
networkConnection.description: Describes one TCP/UDP port on one network device.

cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name for the Network Connection object

dicomHostname.title: Hostname
dicomHostname.description: DNS name for this particular connection

dicomPort.title: Port
dicomPort.description: TCP/UDP port that a service is listening on. May be missing if this network connection is only used for outbound connections

dicomTLSCipherSuite.title: TLS CipherSuites
dicomTLSCipherSuite.description: The TLS CipherSuites that are supported on this particular connection. If not present TLS is disabled

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the Network Connection is installed on the network. If not present, information about the installed status of the Network Connection is inherited from the device

networkAE.title: Network AE
networkAE.description: Application entity that provides services on a network

dicomAETitle.title: AE Title
dicomAETitle.description: Unique AE title for this Network AE

dicomNetworkConnectionReference.title: Network Connection Reference
dicomNetworkConnectionReference.description: JSON Pointers to the Network Connection objects for this AE

dicomAssociationInitiator.title: Association Initiator
dicomAssociationInitiator.description: True if the Network AE can initiate associations.

dicomAssociationAcceptor.title: Association Acceptor
dicomAssociationAcceptor.description: True if the Network AE can accept associations.

dicomDescription.title: AE Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the application entity

dicomApplicationCluster.title: Application Cluster
dicomApplicationCluster.description: Locally defined names for a subset of related applications

dicomPreferredCalledAETitle.title: Preferred Called AE Title
dicomPreferredCalledAETitle.description: AE Title(s) that are preferred for initiating associations

dicomPreferredCallingAETitle.title: Preferred Calling AE Title
dicomPreferredCallingAETitle.description: AE Title(s) that are preferred for accepting associations

dicomSupportedCharacterSet.title: Supported Character Set
dicomSupportedCharacterSet.description: Character Set(s) supported by the Network AE for data sets it receives

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the AE is installed on network. If not present, information about the installed status of the AE is inherited from the device

dicomTransferCapability.title: Transfer Capabilities
dicomTransferCapability.description: transfer capabilities provided by the application entity

transferCapability.title: Transfer Capability
transferCapability.description: Each transfer capability specifies the SOP class that the Network AE can support, the mode that it can utilize (SCP or SCU), and the Transfer Syntax(es) that it can utilize

cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name for the Transfer Capability object

dicomTransferSyntax.title: Transfer Syntax
dicomTransferSyntax.description: Transfer syntax(es) that may be requested as an SCU or that are offered as an SCP.
